DOC.brief_summary: Retrospective analysis to the course and branching pattern as well as surgically relevant inner diameters and lengths of the superficial temporal artery (STA) by digital subtraction angiographies (DSA).
DOC.brief_title: Analysis of the Vascular Pattern of the Superficial Temporal Artery
DOC.criteria: good quality digital subtractions angiographies of the STA bad quality digital subtractions angiographies of the STA
